H0.text: what is the name of son of lord krishna. Samba

H1.text: what is the name of son of lord krishna. Aniruddha

H2.text: what is the name of son of lord krishna. Charudeshna

H3.text: what is the name of son of lord krishna. Pradyumna

A4.text: Pradyumna is the eldest son of the Hindu deities Krishna and his wife Rukmini.

A5.text: Pradyumna was the son of Krishna and the sixty-first grandson of Adinarayana.
